description: Michelle Burt used a fake NI number to claim money meant for those who could not work in the lockdown.
title: Coronavirus benefits fraud: Isle of Man social security worker jailed
title_page: Coronavirus benefits fraud: Isle of Man social security worker jailed - BBC News
maintext: The court heard Burt had seen other fraudulent claims being made but instead of reporting them, she decided to claim in the same way herself.
